Package com.rb.nonbiz.types

Class MoneyUnitFraction

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Number
com.rb.nonbiz.types.RBNumeric<T>
com.rb.nonbiz.types.PreciseValue<MoneyUnitFraction>
com.rb.nonbiz.types.MoneyUnitFraction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<MoneyUnitFraction>
public class MoneyUnitFraction
extends PreciseValue<MoneyUnitFraction>
A ratio of Money

Useful to represent stuff such as "out of $x traded, $y was bought". Basically, whenever the numerator is <= than the denominator.

It's also OK if it's $0 out of $0.

See Also:
MoneyFraction, MoneySignedFraction, Serialized Form
